theme: rustic Italian bread with garlic butter

steps.text: Whisk yeast, honey, and 2½ cups lukewarm water in a medium bowl. Let sit 5 minutes until foamy or creamy.
Add flour and salt. Mix with a rubber spatula until a shaggy dough forms with no dry streaks.
Pour 4 Tbsp. olive oil into a large bowl. Transfer dough to bowl and turn to coat in oil. Cover and chill until doubled in size, at least 8 hours and up to 1 day.
Generously butter a 13×9" baking pan. Transfer dough to prepared pan. Let rise uncovered in a warm spot until doubled in size, at least 1½ hours.
Preheat oven to 450°. Dimple focaccia all over with your fingers. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with flaky sea salt. Bake until puffed and golden brown, 20-30 minutes.
Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium heat. Grate in garlic cloves and cook until lightly toasted, 30-45 seconds.
Brush garlic butter all over focaccia. Slice into squares or rectangles.
